Setup/update feature instruction

Feature is a small executable what extend browser functionality.

 

Feature setup

  • Follow the link UnityBase extension to install extension
  • Press +FREE button, according to this picture:
  • Confirm your agree to install this extension, according to this picture:
  • Ensure in successful installation of extension, according to this picture:
  • Follow the link UnityBase plugin to install the plugin. At the bottom of Google Chrome page will appear the downloaded file:
  • Press this button to initiate setup of plugin
  • Choose installation language from list and then press OK button to continue:
  • Then in all next windows of install master press "Next >" button until installation is complete:

Additional information

  • Manage addition on the extensions page. Learn more about managing extensions
  • Delete additions on the extensions page. Learn more about deleting extensions.
